name: RetroRocket
description: RetroRocket is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its rocket arms and legs, it zooms through the digital realm, exploring the vast world of technology. Its cat-like box body brings a touch of playfulness to its retro console buttons and red-black screen. Equipped with a pair of stylish glasses, RetroRocket can analyze complex data with ease, making it an invaluable member of the club.
